headline: Republic Services price target raised to $260 from $250 at Scotiabank
summary: Scotiabank raised the firm’s price target on Republic Services (RSG) to $260 from $250 and keeps a Sector Perform rating on the shares. Solid waste fundamentals remain strong with pricing holding up, but commodity prices pulled back in Q2, slightly reducing the firm’s confidence in guidance upside risk, the analyst tells investors. The Waste and Environmental Services sector is “rich on valuation,” the firm adds. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaki
